Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory160.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Welcome aboard!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Despite the resemblance, this ship is not in very good condition.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Oh, they say this ship is the sister ship of that Kua-Er grade ship.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'But the configuration of its propulsion system was never finished because of the virus.'}
{2: "So that's why they look so alike?", 3: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "Probably. Anyway, it's impossible to sail it out of here now."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Even if we manage to get it onto the water...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'How long can we expect a ship without power, displacement, or even sea valves to stay afloat?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Simply put, until we find the lair of the Corrupted attacking us, the fishermen will not be safe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Even though my boss says Abyssea is capable of handling its own affairs...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "But that's just him playing tough. He's probably thinking about hiring people he normally can't afford..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Or even selling us to the Ascendants, like Akdilek did.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'But how come you still contacted Babylonia?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'Well, one day when I was selling fish, I heard from a merchant that Babylonia offered help to Akdilek.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: 'So I thought, "What if they\'re willing to help us too?"'}
{2: 'All roads lead to Rome...', 3: '22', 4: "...You've come to the right people.", 5: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "If you can complete this mission, then I'll be able to convince the Abyssea Shipyard to accept help from Babylonia."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "Anyway, this is all that Celica lady's idea, huh?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "I'm not sure why would she be so kind as to help us, but I, Devil 7, will not let her down!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Devil 7', 3: "Okay then, let's start by searching the abandoned ships here!"}
